name: PictureMarkerSymbol
description: Marker symbols are used to draw points and multipoints on the graphics layer. PictureMarkerSymbol uses an image as a marker.

properties.name: width
properties.summary: Width of the image in pixels

properties.name: height
properties.summary: Height of the image in pixels

methods.name: setHeight
methods.summary: Sets the height of the image for display

methods.name: setUrl
methods.summary: Sets the URL where the image is located

methods.name: setWidth
methods.summary: Sets the width of the image for display
